name: Looking for Trouble
description: Some time in the distant future, a scrap looter arrives at an abandoned space station and discovers that they bit off more than they can chew. Instead of some easy loot, they find the place infested with murderous aliens driven crazy by the vast emptiness of space. If the looter wants to survive, they must defeat the hoards guarding the station's power generator. Only then can they restore the station's power, getting them one step closer to escaping from the station with their life.
